name: Happy Petals Flower Shop
description:
Made for 48 hour Wholesome Game Jam~

Welcome to Happy Petals Flower Shop. You're going to do great :)

Fill orders for eager customers! Arrange flowers in any way you like. Game play loops for endless bouquet fun!

Controls:

Mouse click and drag.

Instructions for flower arrangement:

Click on the flower you want to make it appear in the shop! Mouse drag to arrange flowers in their vase.
